translation.en: [teenage girl] "It began as a prank and ended in murder."
translation.es: "Comenzó como una bromay terminó en una masacre".

translation.en: Thank you for shopping at B. Dalton's.
translation.es: Gracias por comprar en B. Dalton.

translation.en: The Shadyside Mall is now closed.
translation.es: El Centro Comercial Shadysideya está cerrado.

translation.en: The Shadyside Mall is now closed.
translation.es: El Centro Comercial Shadysideya está cerrado.

translation.en: Hello, this is B. Dalton's. We're closed.
OK, since when do you work late?
Since my mom used her last paycheck on scratch tickets instead of the gas bill.
translation.es: Desde que mi madre usó su sueldoen lotería en lugar de pagar el gas.

translation.en: I do need a ride tonight.
translation.es: Necesito que me tires en casa.

translation.en: And, yes, I don't want to walk home alone.
translation.es: Y sí, no quiero caminar sola a casa.

translation.en: Fine. Just give me and, uh… Jasmine here 15 minutes to close up.
translation.es: Bien. Danos 15 minutosa mí y a Jasmine para cerrar.

translation.en: Yeah, I thought, uh… "Big Tits" was kind of deflating her ego.
translation.es: Sí, me pareció que "Tetona"le desinflaba el ego.

translation.en: Hi, um… I'm in the Shadyside Mall.
translation.es: Estoy en el Centro Comercial Shadyside.

translation.en: Ma'am, if you don't answer, I'm gonna dispatch help.
while Sunnyvale enters its 30th year with no violent crime.
translation.es: mientras que Sunnyvalecumple 30 años sin crímenes violentos.

translation.en: [female reporter 2] Killer Capital, USA, as tragedy struck again.
translation.es: La ciudad más sangrienta del país. La tragedia vuelve a acechar.

translation.en: [male sports announcer] Sunnyvale football wins again!
translation.es: ¡El equipo de fútbol americanovuelve a ganar en Sunnyvale!

translation.en: [female reporter 3] Christina Marlow and Jessica Van were found in a house in a residential area near Shadyside.
translation.es: Hallan a Christina Marlow y Jessica Vanen una casa cerca de Shadyside.

translation.en: [man 1] Shadysiders seem to have no desire to better themselves.
translation.es: Los residentes de Shadysideno parecen querer mejorar.

translation.en: More body parts found in the lake between Shadyside and Sunnyvale.
translation.es: Hallan más partes de cuerposen el lago entre Shadyside y Sunnyvale.

translation.en: [male announcer 1] Sunnyvale voted Most Beautiful Place to Live!
[male reporter 2] Shadyside residents are spending another night hunkering down in darkness as…
translation.es: Residentes de Shadyside pasanotra noche resguardándose…

translation.en: [male announcer 2] Find your new home in Sunnyvale,
where the sun always shines, even when it's cloudy!
translation.es: ¡donde siempre brilla el solaunque esté nublado!

translation.en: While the depression hit Shadyside hard,
translation.es: Mientras la depresióngolpea fuerte a Shadyside,

translation.en: the economy in Sunnyvale continues to shine.
[female reporter 4] According to sources with the Shadyside Police…
♪ I'm only happy when it rains ♪
♪ You know I love it When the news is bad ♪ ♪ Why it feels so good to feel so sad? ♪

translation.es: Shadyside, un pueblo de Estados Unidos

translation.en: But among locals, a history of horror has earned it another nickname,
translation.es: que, entre los lugareños,se ha ganado otro sobrenombre:

translation.en: -And last night, tragedy struck again. -Ugh, Dad!
translation.es: - Anoche, la tragedia volvió a acechar.- ¡Papá!

translation.en: I'm here with Sheriff Nick Goode. Sheriff, what can you tell us?
translation.es: Estoy con el sheriff Nick Goode.¿Qué puede decirnos?

translation.en: [female reporter] Shadyside sits just beside Sunnyvale,
one of the safest and wealthiest communities in the country…
translation.es: uno de los pobladosmás seguros y adinerados…

translation.en: What is it about Shadyside? How do we end this cycle of violence?
translation.es: ¿Qué pasa en Shadyside?¿Cómo acabar con la violencia?

translation.en: -♪ I am a man who walks alone… ♪ -[keyboard clicking] ♪ And when I'm walking a dark road ♪
translation.es: AQUÍ, SEÑOR SILENCIO, SEÑORA.A SU SERVICIO…

translation.en: ♪ At night Or strolling through the park… ♪
translation.es: QUEEN OF AIR AND DARKNESS ESCRIBE:

translation.en: ♪ When the light begins to change ♪
translation.es: ¡ASESINO CON MÁSCARA DE CALAVERA! SÍ, LO VI EN LAS NOTICIAS.OTRO VECINO QUE "ENLOQUECIÓ".

translation.en: ♪ I sometimes feel a little strange ♪ ♪ A little anxious when it's dark ♪
translation.es: SÍ, LO VI EN LAS NOTICIAS.OTRO VECINO QUE "ENLOQUECIÓ".

translation.en: -Dude! What the hell? -This isn't yours, dillweed!
translation.es: - ¿Qué diablos haces?- ¡Esto no es tuyo, idiota!

translation.en: Oh, I get it. You building a shrine or something?
Alright, you know what? It's time for school. Get in the car.
translation.es: Debemos ir a la escuela. Sube al auto.

translation.en: Dad said you weren't allowed on this. Know how expensive AOL is?
translation.es: Papá te lo prohibió.¿Sabes lo caro que es AOL?

translation.en: I'm stealing it. I'm talking to someone!
This internet bullshit is exactly why you have no friends.
translation.es: No tienes amigospor esta tontería de Internet.

translation.en: It's not bullshit. It's a community dedicated to the truth.
translation.es: No es una tontería.Es una comunidad dedicada a la verdad.

translation.en: Look, some guy went crazy and killed a bunch of people at the mall last night.
translation.es: Mira, un tipo enloqueció y mató genteanoche en el centro comercial.

translation.en: [Josh] It was all over the news.
translation.es: Salió en todas partes. INFORME POLICIAL

translation.en: But, of course, the media won't talk about the most important part.
translation.es: Y claro que los medios no hablande la parte más importante.

translation.en: [Deena] Josh, I am telling you calmly,
translation.es: Josh, te lo diré con calma,

translation.en: step out of your internet fantasy nerd land and get in the car.
translation.es: deja tu fantasía nerd de Internety súbete al auto.

translation.en: Step out your depressoid "I'm gonna die alone" land, and stop obsessing about Sam!
translation.es: ¡Deja tu paranoia de que morirás solay de obsesionarte con Sam!

translation.en: Up, up, down, down. Left, right, left, right, B, A, start.
translation.es: Arriba, arriba, abajo, abajo, izquierda,derecha, izquierda, derecha, B, A, start.

translation.en: You see? It's the witch. Sarah Fier's back.
translation.es: ¿Ves? Es la bruja. Sarah Fier regresó.

translation.en: "She reaches from beyond the grave to make good men her wicked slaves!"
translation.es: "¡De su tumba revivióy a todo el mundo esclavizó!".

translation.en: "She'll take your head. She'll follow you until you're dead!"
translation.es: "¡Tu sangre quiere quitartey no parará hasta matarte!".

translation.en: What? The dude was wearing a Halloween skull mask!
The dude was probably just some sad sack who hated his life, like the rest of us,
translation.es: Seguro que era un infeliz que detestabasu vida, como el resto de nosotros,

translation.en: except he decided, "Hey, why don't I get out of here for good?"
translation.es: pero pensó:"¿Por qué no huyo de aquí para siempre?

translation.en: And, "Hey, why don't I take Heather and a couple other mall rats with me?"
translation.es: ¿Y por qué no llevarmea Heather y un par más conmigo?".

translation.en: There's no angry dead witch who made him go postal.
translation.es: No lo enloquecióninguna bruja muerta y enfadada.

translation.en: The only thing that made him go crazy is this town!
Seems like… maybe you got a little witch in you.
translation.es: Parece…que quizás llevas una brujita dentro.

translation.en: Dude, why are you even in here? This is the girls' bathroom.
translation.es: ¿Y qué haces aquí? Es el baño de damas.

translation.en: You know we don't believe this witch shit, right?
translation.es: No creemos en esta tontería de la bruja.

translation.en: It's just, like, fucked-up Santa Claus or something.
translation.es: Es como un Papá Noel jodido o algo así.

translation.en: -What's this? -I need you to give this to Sam tonight.
translation.es: - ¿Qué es?- Dáselo esta noche a Sam.

translation.en: I am not getting mixed up in your ex drama. Do it yourself.
translation.es: No seré partedel drama con tu ex. Hazlo tú.

translation.en: I'm not going to the game. I quit band.
translation.es: No iré al partido. Dejé la banda.

translation.en: Was band the only extracurricular you had left?
You still have your band uniform, right?
You just wear that shit one last time.
translation.es: Ponte esa mierda una última vez.

translation.en: I've got something that'll give you the balls to face Sam.
translation.es: Tengo algo que te dará corajepara enfrentar a Sam.

translation.en: What? You're dealing again? I thought you stopped after this dingus's brother OD'd.
translation.es: ¿Traficando otra vez? ¿No habías parado tras la sobredosisdel hermano de este idiota?

translation.en: Wh… Uh… Timmy wasn't a real OD.
Which one of us is valedictorian, again?
President of every club this shithole has to offer.
translation.es: Y preside todos los clubes de este antro.

translation.en: I'm getting out of here. Off to claim my place among the stars, bitch.
translation.es: Me voy. Debo reclamarmi lugar entre las estrellas, perra.

translation.en: [boy] Woo! The witch lives! Long live Sarah Fier!
out of respect for last night's tragic events,
translation.es: por respetoa los trágicos sucesos de anoche,

translation.en: Sunnyvale will host a candlelight vigil for the victims.
translation.es: habrá una vigilia con velaspor las víctimas.

translation.en: All player, cheer and band attendance is mandatory.
translation.es: Deben asistir todos los jugadores,las porristas y la banda.

translation.en: ♪ I don't care if it hurts… ♪ [music fades]
[man 1 over speakers] This isn't how I wanted to be here tonight.
translation.es: No quería estar aquí de esta forma.

translation.en: I wanted to be here as a fan.
translation.es: Quería estar como un fanático. LOS DEMONIOS

translation.en: Our Sunnyvale Devils and your Shadyside Witches
translation.es: Y que los Demonios de Sunnyvaley las Brujas de Shadyside

translation.en: throwing down some good old American football.
as a husband, a father, as a neighbor.
translation.es: en calidad de esposo, padre, vecino.
Y sí, como alcalde de Sunnyvale.

translation.en: And on behalf of all of the people in my town,
translation.es: En nombre de todo nuestro pueblo,

translation.en: I say all of Sunnyvale mourns with you.
translation.es: les digo que Sunnyvale llora con ustedes.

translation.en: Yeah, really looks like they give a damn.
translation.es: Seguro. En serio parece que les importa.

translation.en: The only Sunnyvalers who came were the ones who had to.
translation.es: Solo vinieron de Sunnyvalelos que tuvieron que hacerlo.

translation.en: The football team and the cheerleaders.
[mayor] Our hearts are broken with grief.
translation.es: Tenemos el corazón lleno de dolor.

translation.en: I didn't think you were coming. I thought you quit band.
translation.es: No creí que vendrías.Pensé que habías dejado la banda.

translation.en: [man 2 over speakers] My family's been in Sunnyvale for generations,
translation.es: Mi familia ha estado aquípor generaciones,

translation.en: and now my brother is mayor and I your sheriff.
translation.es: y ahora mi hermano es el alcaldey yo, el sheriff.

translation.en: And yet, I've seen you, our neighbors in Shadyside,
translation.es: Pero he visto a mis vecinos de Shadyside

translation.en: It's easy in times like this to drown in questions of why…
translation.es: Es fácil, en momentos como este,preguntarse por qué…

translation.en: there are no answers that will provide relief.
translation.es: que no hay respuestas que brinden alivio.

translation.en: There's no peace found in the past.
translation.es: No hay paz en el pasado.

translation.en: You broke up with me! Remember? So stop acting like I'm the bad guy.
translation.es: ¡Tú me dejaste! ¿Recuerdas?Deja de actuar como si fuera al revés.

translation.en: Yeah, well, I'm not the one who moved to Sunnyvale.
translation.es: Yo no me mudé a Sunnyvale.

translation.en: OK, you made the choice. I just made it official.
translation.es: Tú elegiste. Yo lo hice oficial.

translation.en: You just couldn't wait to start your new fake life with your fake-ass mom!
translation.es: ¡Ansiabas tu nueva vida de mentiracon la farsante de tu madre!

translation.en: I am half an hour away.
It might as well be the goddamn moon, and you know it.
translation.es: Podrías mudarte a la luna y daría igual.

translation.en: I know you were always too afraid to tell anyone about us.
translation.es: Sé que siempre tenías mucho miedode contar lo nuestro.

translation.en: And I know that douchebag out there was squeezing your ass.
translation.es: Y que ese imbécil te apretaba el trasero.

translation.en: -You broke up with me. -What's his name?
-You broke up with me! -What's his name, Sam?
We must not fall into darkness.
translation.es: No debemos caer en la oscuridad.

translation.en: We must look to the light.
[scoffs] Yeah! What we should do is light a fuse
translation.es: ¡Claro! Lo que deberíamos haceres encender una mecha

translation.en: -You don't get it! -[Deena] No, no. I do.
There's not much of a future in Shadyside with a lesbo.
translation.es: No hay mucho futuroen Shadyside con una lesbiana.

translation.en: Dead on the mall floor after a double shift,
translation.es: Podrías morir en el centro comercial

translation.en: or maybe, maybe if you're really lucky, you're the one carrying the knife.
translation.es: o, si tienes mucha suerte,podrías ser quien lleva el cuchillo.

translation.en: I said it ain't a tragedy when it happens every week.
translation.es: Dije que no es una tragediasi pasa todas las semanas.

translation.en: -"Welcome to the suck!" "Shit is doomed!" -Shit is doomed!
translation.es: - "Esto es un infierno. Es una condena".- ¡Es una condena!
No tiene por qué ser así.

translation.en: -It's like you want to lose. -At least I know who I am.
translation.es: - Parece que quieres perder.- Pero sé quién soy.

translation.en: Stop being mad at me for wanting a different future.
translation.es: Deja de estar enfadada conmigopor querer un futuro diferente.

translation.en: It's not your future if you're pretending to be someone else.
translation.es: No es tu futurosi finges ser otra persona.

translation.en: You little green prick! Come here, you little bitch! Come here!
-They think they can do what they want! -[all] No!
translation.es: - ¡Creen que pueden hacer lo que quieren!- ¡No!

translation.en: [Kate] They ruin our vigil, then go waltzing back to their mansions,
translation.es: ¡Arruinan nuestra vigiliay se escabullen a sus mansiones

translation.en: like we're some reject pile that they can step on!
translation.es: como si fuéramos basuraque pueden pisotear!

translation.en: Well, we are not the reject pile!
We're gonna go kill those preppy assholes!
[shouting] When I say Shady, you say side!
When I say Shady, you say side!
[Simon] When I say Shady, you say side!
-You gotta be kidding me. -Hey, isn't that, uh…
[boy] Where are you going, you pussies?
-[Sam] Peter, stop! What are you doing? -[Peter] Chill out!
This is definitely a good idea, right? Deena?
[Peter] Sam! What… what are you doing?
Stay away from her, you bull dyke freak!
[Kate] OK, we should not be down here.
-Shut up, help me carry her! -We need to leave, like ten minutes ago.
-We have to clear her airway. -Quit it!
Hey! I got this. Chill out.
-How many fingers am I holding up? -Three.
Well, it was driving behind the bus. Does that count as pursuing?
translation.es: Iba detrás del autobús.¿Eso cuenta como perseguir?

translation.en: The driver said that before the crash someone opened the emergency exit.
translation.es: El conductor dijoque alguien abrió la puerta de emergencia.

translation.en: He also saw you with the cooler.
Maybe you were just, um… goofing around.

translation.es: Se te fue de las manos.

translation.en: -Why don't you tell me what happened? -[Deena] I don't know.
translation.es: Solo dime qué pasó. No lo sé.

translation.en: Well, if you do think of anything,
translation.es: Pues, si te acuerdas de algo,

translation.en: My car is totaled. Well, Daddy will buy you a new one.
translation.es: - Mi auto quedó destruido.- Papá te comprará uno nuevo.

translation.en: Do it before Dad gets here, he's gonna murder you!
You know the cops called him at work about some accident last night?
translation.es: ¿La policía lo llamó al trabajopor un accidente de anoche?

translation.en: Please get out of my room. You get out of your room. You've been in your bed all day!
translation.es: - Sal de mi habitación.- ¡Estuviste todo el día en la cama!

translation.en: [female reporter] I'm here with Martin P. Franklin, Shadyside Mall Janitor.
translation.es: Estoy con el conserjedel Centro Comercial Shadyside.

translation.en: -Martin, what do you know? -[Martin] He was a normal dude.
translation.es: - Martin, ¿qué sabe?- Era un chico normal.

translation.en: Always thought he would, like, just go home and read a comic book or whatever.
translation.es: Me imaginaba que volvía a su casay leía un cómic o algo así.

translation.en: He was chill, just snapped I guess.
as mall employee Ryan Torres has been identified as the killer.
translation.es: que se haya identificadoal empleado Ryan Torres como el asesino.

translation.en: A recent graduate of Shadyside High
an ordinary guy who, as those who knew him attest,
translation.es: un chico normal que,según quienes lo conocían,

translation.en: Hi. Uh, Samantha Fraser's room, please?
translation.es: Hola. Con la habitaciónde Samantha Fraser.

translation.en: -[woman] Hello? -[Deena] Uh… Hi, uh, Mrs. Fraser.
-I wanted to see how she was doing. -[Ms. Fraser] Deena?
I was just w… worried about her and--
[Ms. Fraser] You won't stop until you've ruined her life completely, will you?
translation.es: No te detendrás hasta arruinarlela vida por completo, ¿no?

translation.en: -She's fine. Don't call here again. -[line goes dead]
translation.es: Ella está bien. No vuelvas a llamar.

translation.en: See you got the full costume now!
If you finish in an hour, I'll let you watch My So-Called Life with me.
translation.es: Si acaban en una hora,podrán ver El mundo de Ángela conmigo.

translation.en: And, uh, do not eat these.
These will make your little hearts stop, you'll choke to death on vomit
translation.es: Se les detendrá el corazón,morirán ahogadas,

translation.en: and everyone will be so, so super sad.
translation.es: y todos se pondrán muy tristes.

translation.en: [man 1] Bob, easy with that blood. It's our last can!
translation.es: Cuidado con esa sangre.¡Es la última lata!

translation.en: Lights and darks, and watch for stray socks.
translation.es: Ropa blanca y de color,y busca los calcetines sueltos.

translation.en: -Remind me what's in it for me again? -Nope.
You still wearing the clothes from last night?
Did you wear that to the grocery store?
I had to work a double shift and this was all I had in the car.
translation.es: Hice doble jornada,y era lo único que tenía en el auto.
Hice doble jornada,y era lo único que tenía en el auto. Así es.

translation.en: -[man 1 on TV] Alright, kiddo? -[man 2] There I was at ten…
translation.es: - ¿Estás bien?- Allí estaba a las diez…
Cuido niños. Mira por la ventana.

translation.en: That prick Peter is screwing with me.
Yeah, he's creeping around our house in one of those skull masks. It's fucked.
translation.es: Se pasea por casacon una máscara de calavera. Una mierda.

translation.en: [sighs] I gotta go. Call you back.
What? Make up your mind, woman!
-[whispering] Maybe this isn't a good id-- -Shh!
-[quietly] Are you crazy? -[Kate] It's just that Sunnyvale asshole.
translation.es: - ¿Estás loca?- Es el idiota de Sunnyvale.

translation.en: Oh, no. I'm so happy to have the company.
translation.es: No. Me alegra mucho la compañía.

translation.en: -[Kate] You're a lifesaver, Mrs. Lane. -[Mrs. Lane] I used to be a nurse.
translation.es: - Me salva la vida, Sra. Lane.- Fui enfermera.

translation.en: Are you… you sure everything's OK?
Totally! I just have to run out and…
Why would he break in there? I just don't understand what he was doing.
translation.es: - ¡Matar a ese pervertido!- ¿Por qué entraría? - No entiendo qué hacía.- Actuaba de lo más turbio.

translation.en: He was acting all shifty and shit.
translation.es: - No entiendo qué hacía.- Actuaba de lo más turbio.

translation.en: You need to get some groceries, man.
-We have an incredible sale at the store-- -He broke into the house! He had a knife!
translation.es: - Tenemos increíbles ofertas…- ¡Se metió en la casa! ¡Con un cuchillo!

translation.en: Whoa! With the kids there? That's wack!
translation.es: ¡Vaya! ¿Con las niñas ahí?¡Eso está muy mal!

translation.en: There were kids there. OK, and what?
He thinks because he's balling Sam,
he can come and prank us on our own turf.
translation.es: cree que puede burlarse de nosotros aquí?

translation.en: Hey, you know what? You're right. Fuck this.
translation.es: Tienes razón. Al diablo con esto.

translation.en: Don't forget the most important part. Fuck Sam.
translation.es: No olvides lo más importante.Al diablo con Sam.

translation.en: Yeah, fuck her. She needs to get her psycho boyfriend in check.
translation.es: Sí, que se pudra.Debe controlar al psicópata de su novio.

translation.en: -Fill these out and take a seat. -No, I'm just visiting.
translation.es: - Llena esto y toma asiento.- Vengo de visita.

translation.en: [clears throat] Tell Nurse Beddy she has a patient.
Beddy. Long time, how you been?
-Still toting around with this moron. -She can't quit me, Beddy. Too pretty!
translation.es: - Sigues acarreando a este idiota.- No puede dejarme, Beddy. ¡Soy muy lindo!

translation.en: I'm sure that you do, but there happens to be a new security protocol.
translation.es: Seguramente, pero sucede que hayun nuevo protocolo de seguridad.

translation.en: We kept coming up short on blueberries and bananas.
translation.es: Como siempre nos quedábamossin arándanos y bananas,

translation.en: -So now I need a special key-- -I need to see a patient.
translation.es: - le pusieron llave…- Debo ver a una paciente.

translation.en: You want anything from the machine? I'm starving.
translation.es: ¿Quieres algo de la máquina?Muero de hambre.

translation.en: -What are you doing here? -What do you think?
-What game? What are you talking about? -[Deena] About your dipshit boyfriend.
translation.es: - ¿Qué juego? ¿De qué hablas?- Del idiota de tu novio.

translation.en: -He threatened, "You're all fucking dead." -That didn't mean anything.
translation.es: - Ayer amenazó con matarnos.- No quiere decir nada.

translation.en: Now tonight, he's stalking around, messing with us.
translation.es: Y ahora nos acecha y nos molesta.

translation.en: He broke into the house where Kate was babysitting.
translation.es: Se metió donde Kate cuidaba a las niñas.

translation.en: You need to call him and tell him to back off.
translation.es: Llámalo y dile que la termine.

translation.en: Good news. They're gonna transfer you out of this shithole tomorrow.
translation.es: Buenas noticias.Mañana te sacarán de esta pocilga.

translation.en: Don't look at me, dude. I'm… I'm… I'm broke.
[Sam] He has been with me all night!
-Stop covering for him! He's a bad guy. -You're out of control!
translation.es: - Deja de cubrirlo. Es un mal tipo.- ¡Estás descontrolada!

translation.en: You put me in the hospital! Now you're here yelling at me--
OK. No, that was an accident. Look, I got a nosebleed.
translation.es: No, eso fue un accidente.Mira, me sangraba la nariz.

translation.en: -I didn't actually mean-- -A nosebleed? Stop making excuses!
translation.es: ¿Te sangraba la nariz?¡Deja de inventar excusas!

translation.en: So don't blame me when you wake up in ten years just like your dad!
translation.es: ¡No me culpes cuando amanezcascomo tu padre en diez años!

translation.en: Old and drunk and going nowhere!
Second, yeah. Congrats on getting out of Shadyside, Sam.
translation.es: Segundo, sí.Felicitaciones por salir de Shadyside.

translation.en: All you had to do was suck it up, literally, and swallow some Sunnyvale--
You know what? I never want to see you again!
Great. Have a nice goddamn life!
-Where'd you learn how to do this? -Oh, a lot of people trade hacks online.
translation.es: - ¿Dónde aprendiste eso?- Trucos que se intercambian en línea.

translation.en: So, um… [chuckles] …when'd you get into the fruit business?
translation.es: Y… ¿cuándo te metisteen el negocio de las frutas?

translation.en: Oh, that's just temporary. Saving up to get out of here.
translation.es: Es algo temporal.Ahorro para salir de aquí.

translation.en: -Where are the keys? Do you have the keys? -No!
-[Deena whispers] No! -You can't wear that mask. What are--
-[Simon] Come on! Let's go! -[Josh] Come on!
[female reporter] Mall employee Ryan Torres has been identified
translation.es: Se ha identificado al empleado Ryan Torres

translation.en: as the killer in the mall massacre.
translation.es: como el asesino de la masacre.

translation.en: -[Simon] Deena! Hurry up! Let's go! -[Deena] Go! Go!
-[Simon] We have to go now! -[Deena] Hurry!
[Nick] You have access to the mall. You are still employed there, correct?
translation.es: Tienes acceso al centro comercial.Aún eres empleado, ¿no?

translation.en: I'mma tell you again. Somebody planted that.
translation.es: Se lo diré otra vez. Alguien lo plantó.

translation.en: Why would I tag my own place of work? Come on, man!
translation.es: ¿Por qué pintaría mi lugar de trabajo?¡Por favor, viejo!

translation.en: Martin, around here, people show a little respect. They call me Sheriff Goode.
translation.es: Martin, aquí la gente me tiene respeto.Me dicen sheriff Goode.

translation.en: [Deena] I'm telling you, it was him!
The psycho killer my colleague shot dead, huh?
Yes! That's what we keep saying!
You told me to come to you.
We should not be this close to the police station in a stolen ambulance.
translation.es: No deberíamos estartan cerca de la estación de policía.

translation.en: Ted Bundy, when he was stalking his victims, I mean.
translation.es: Cuando Ted Bundy acechaba a sus víctimas.

translation.en: OK, didn't he get caught though?
-Well, no. Well, yeah, but-- -Figure this out. I'm gonna take a leak.
translation.es: Pues no. Bueno… Averígüenlo. Iré a hacer pis.

translation.en: -[Josh sighs] -Why do you know so much about killers?
-You hang onto any of that candy? -[Josh] Yeah.

translation.es: Y se le salió la máscara.

translation.en: Yeah. Yeah, the mall killer, Ryan Torres.
translation.es: Sí, el asesino del centro comercial:Ryan Torres.

translation.en: I know, but you guys must have made a mistake or something. Look…
translation.es: Lo sé, pero debieron cometerun error o algo. Mire…
- Sé lo que vi.- De acuerdo.

translation.en: Let me get the right paperwork.
Would you say he was more, uh, Dawn of the Dead or Night of the Living Dead?
translation.es: ¿Era más bien El amanecer de los muertoso La noche de los muertos vivientes?

translation.en: -You don't believe us? -This was a waste of time.
We've had prank calls, we've had reports of skeleton mask copycats all weekend.
translation.es: Siempre nos hacen bromas, denunciana imitadores con máscara de esqueleto.

translation.en: Got a call from the hospital. Lady sounded worked up.
translation.es: Llamó una mujer desde el hospital.Estaba alterada.

translation.en: Uh… wait, I'll… I got it. Take care of them.
translation.es: Un momento… Yo me ocupo.Tú termina con ellas.

translation.en: [girl singing] ♪ You always hurt the one you love ♪
translation.es: Siempre hieres a quien más quieres.

translation.en: ♪ The one you shouldn't hurt at all ♪
This is bullshit. There are bodies at the hospital. You're gonna see--
translation.es: Esto está mal.Hay cuerpos en el hospital. Ya lo verán…

translation.en: Honey, we are so appreciative of this tip.
-The killer is still out there! -We'll do our damnedest to catch him.
translation.es: - ¡El asesino sigue suelto!- Daremos todo para atraparlo.

translation.en: You're a monster! You're supposed to protect us!
Hey, hey! Young lady, do not test me!
[panting] I'm so sorry, sir. I have no idea what came over me.
translation.es: Lo siento, señor. No sé qué me pasó.

translation.en: Go find your boyfriends! Tell them you need to relax!
translation.es: ¡Busquen a sus novios!¡Díganles que deben relajarse!

translation.en: Do… do you need help? What the…
-[Simon screams] -[Sam] Deena, slow down! -[Sam] What are you doing? -[Deena] Just walk, fast.
I think we should stay. We're safe here. What if that psycho shows up again?
translation.es: Aquí estamos más seguros.¿Y si el psicópata aparece?

translation.en: -Then we'll be ready. -[Sam] What the hell?
Is that the cop's? You stole a cop's gun?
translation.es: ¿Le robaste el arma a un policía?

translation.en: -You out of your goddamn mind? -They didn't believe us.
-[Kate] Come on! -[Simon] Go! Go! Let's go!
[Sam] It doesn't make sense. It's… it's not possible.

translation.es: - Las balas no la pararon.- No me digas.

translation.en: -Who the hell was that? -How the hell should I know? She…
translation.es: - ¿Quién diablos era?- ¿Y yo qué carajo sé?

translation.en: She was hot! I don't know! The bitch seemed normal!
I hate to break it to you, but normal bitches don't bleed black fucking blood!
translation.es: ¡Lamento decirte que las perras normalesno tienen sangre negra!

translation.en: Well, she was hot and normal until she attacked me with a fucking razor blade!
translation.es: ¡Era atractiva y normal hasta que me atacócon una cuchilla!

translation.en: Yeah, for like old-timey shaving, or in this case, I guess, slitting her--
translation.es: Sí, de esas viejas para afeitarse.O, en este caso, para cortarse…
Las muñecas. Se cortó las venas.

translation.en: Was she singing a song, like an oldie… like an oldie song?
translation.es: ¿Cantaba una canción de las de antes?

translation.en: Jesus, Rain Man. How the fuck do you know that?
translation.es: Dios, Rain Man. ¿Cómo diablos lo sabes?

translation.en: -[Josh] The girl who attacked you. -[Simon] Holy shit!
She sang as she murdered her boyfriend,
translation.es: Cantaba mientras asesinó a su novio,a sus amigas,

translation.en: her friends, then she killed herself. Slashed her wrists.
translation.es: Cantaba mientras asesinó a su novio,a sus amigas, y luego se suicidó, se cortó las venas.

translation.en: Jesus. Yeah, why didn't I see this on the news?
translation.es: Dios. ¿Por qué no lo vi en las noticias?

translation.en: Ruby is one of Shadyside's killers, just like Skull Mask.
translation.es: Es una de las asesinas de Shadyside,como Máscara de Calavera.

translation.en: -[Josh] "Masked psycho murders kids at--" -[Kate] Camp Nightwing.
Yeah, my mom's sister was there.
That screwed my family up for a long time.
translation.es: Afectó a mi familia mucho tiempo.

translation.en: local milkman slashes a bunch of housewives.
translation.es: lechero local,acuchilla a varias amas de casa.

translation.en: 1904, Grifter guts girls, and on and on.
It happens in Shadyside over and over. Normal people turn into psychos.
translation.es: Se repite en Shadyside.Gente que se vuelve psicópata.

translation.en: 1666. He was the first one recorded.
He, um… killed kids and cut out their eyes.
translation.es: Mataba a niños y les arrancaba los ojos.

translation.en: -I always liked this sweater. -Yeah, I know.
translation.es: - Me gusta este suéter.- Ya sé.

translation.en: If you get blood on it, I'll kill you.
There are people trying to kill us.
Dead people, if you believe my weirdo brother.
translation.es: Gente muerta, si le creesal raro de mi hermano.

translation.en: That's not what I meant. Yeah, I know.
translation.es: - No hablaba de eso.- Sí, ya sé.

translation.en: Look, I know I always give you shit for pretending you're someone you're not, but it's…
translation.es: Sé que siempre soy dura contigopor fingir ser alguien que no eres, pero…

translation.en: It's not really easy for me to…
you know, be like us… either.
-Are you giving me a pass? -[chuckles] No.
Fine. I'm not gonna say what I was gonna say.
translation.es: Bien. No diré lo que iba a decir.

translation.en: I mean, here we are. We're together for one night and--
translation.es: Es decir, aquí estamos.Nos juntamos una noche y…

translation.en: Dead people are trying to kill us.
No one actually thinks that this witch shit is real.
translation.es: Nadie cree que lo de la bruja sea verdad.

translation.en: Yeah, it's something babysitters make up to scare kids.
translation.es: Lo inventan las niñeraspara asustar a los niños.

translation.en: No, no. Just listen to me.
1666, Sarah Fier was hanged for witchcraft, fact.
translation.es: En 1666,Sarah Fier fue a la horca por brujería.

translation.en: But ever since she was executed, she's been possessing people,
translation.es: Desde entonces, posee a las personas,

translation.en: turning them into killers, to take revenge on the town.
translation.es: las convierte en asesinas para vengarse.

translation.en: -[Simon] It's like the nursery rhyme. -[Josh] Yeah. Yeah.
translation.es: las convierte en asesinas para vengarse. - Es como la canción de cuna.- Sí.

translation.en: [Simon] "Before the witch's final breath, she found a way to cheat her death."
translation.es: "Antes de su último suspiro,la bruja escapó de su destino.

translation.en: "By cutting off her cursed hand, she kept her grip upon our land."
translation.es: Al cortarle una mano,se quedó en este plano.

translation.en: to make good men her wicked slaves."
translation.es: y a todo el mundo esclavizó".

translation.en: Don't you see what's happening to us? This is all proof.
translation.es: ¿No ven lo que nos está pasando?Estas son las pruebas.

translation.en: Shadyside isn't just some hotbed for psychos.
translation.es: Shadyside no esun semillero de psicópatas.

translation.en: All these massacres are connected to Sarah Fier. The witch's curse is real!
translation.es: Las masacres se conectan con Sarah Fier.¡La maldición de la bruja es real!

translation.en: Fine. Let's assume that the witch has been possessing people
translation.es: Supongamos que la brujaha estado poseyendo gente

translation.en: for some sort of messed-up vendetta.
This isn't the same as the mall massacre. Something different is happening to us.
translation.es: No es como la masacredel centro comercial. Es distinto.

translation.en: OK, we have two of her killers after us and both of them are dead.
translation.es: Nos persiguen dos de sus asesinos,y ambos están muertos.

translation.en: Why is she so mad at us?
I don't know, you know. I thought I hit my head…
translation.es: No sé.Creí que me había golpeado la cabeza…

translation.en: I can't believe you're wearing that.
Can't believe you're above it, when we're in the middle of the fucking woods and dead maniacs are after us.
translation.es: Y que estemos en medio del bosquey nos persigan maniáticos muertos.

translation.en: OK, so I fell out of the car…
This is bad! This is really bad!
No wonder the witch is pissed at us. I'd be pissed too. Sam disturbed her grave.
translation.es: Con razón está enfadada con nosotros.Sam perturbó su tumba.

translation.en: [sighs] Now she's sending her henchmen after us.
translation.es: Y ahora nos envía a sus secuaces.

translation.en: As in every one of those sickos on your wall is coming after us?
translation.es: ¿Nos perseguirántodos los psicópatas de tu pared?

translation.en: [Simon] Hold up. Hold up. She's mad because we disturbed her grave, right?
Just put the bones back, rebury them, and put her to rest!
translation.es: Coloquemos los huesos,enterrémoslos y acabemos con esto.

translation.en: Whatever. Let's do it quickly so we can go.
translation.es: Como sea. Rápido, así nos vamos.

translation.en: Deena, Deena! Find something to wrap her bones!
I think there's someone in the woods!
-That was the Camp Nightwing Killer! -That was a bust!
Yeah, maybe because it's not like the movies, OK?
translation.es: Quizás porque no es como en las películas.

translation.en: It's not as easy as putting bones to rest!
translation.es: ¡No es tan fácil como enterrar huesos!

translation.en: -It should've worked. It always works! -[Josh] Maybe it's her missing hand.
translation.es: - Pero ¡siempre funciona!- Quizás es por la mano que le falta.

translation.en: Who gives a shit? It doesn't matter. Hey, how do I not die?
translation.es: ¿A quién le importa?¿Cómo hago para no morir?

translation.en: [Simon] We! How do we not die! And I'm looking at you, witch nerd!
translation.es: ¿Cómo hacemos para no morir?Te miro a ti, nerd de brujas.

translation.en: -I… I don't know! -They're not coming for us!
-I saw her again… -[woman whispers] It's you.
The witch. She… I disturbed her grave.
translation.es: A la bruja. Yo perturbé su tumba.
- Eres tú.- Me quiere a mí.

translation.en: Yeah. Yeah, yeah. Nightwing ran right by me.
translation.es: Sí. Nightwing me pasó por al lado.

translation.en: I jumped out his way, it was like he didn't even see me. He went for her.
translation.es: Pero siguió de largo, ni siquiera me vio. Iba tras ella.

translation.en: Skull Mask came after us at home. And while you guys were babysitting!
translation.es: Máscara de Calavera fue a mi casa.¡Y adonde ustedes estaban!

translation.en: Skull Mask didn't care about us.

translation.es: Quería esto, la sangre de Sam.

translation.en: Yeah! From the crash when Sam puked period!
It's Jaws, dude! A shark smelling blood!
translation.es: ¡Es Tiburón, viejo!¡Un tiburón que huele sangre!

translation.en: [panting] Kate's right! When we found Skeletor,
he was all sniffy and weird with my shirt like a perv in a pantie shop!
translation.es: ¡tomó mi camisetay la olió como un pervertido con lencería!

translation.en: Yeah, but he came to our house too!
[Simon] Sam bled on her bones, now the witch wants more of her blood!
translation.es: Sam sangró sobre sus huesos.¡Quiere más de su sangre!

translation.en: OK, so what do they do in Jaws?
They didn't go skinny-dipping with the goddamn bait. She's not bait!
translation.es: - No nadan desnudos como carnada.- ¡Ella no es carnada!

translation.en: Seriously, if we're right and they're after her…
translation.es: En serio, si tenemos razóny la quieren a ella,

translation.en: let's give these assholes what they want.
translation.es: démosles a estos pendejos lo que quieren.

translation.en: You can't have any of Sam's blood on you. Well, not much I can do about that.
translation.es: - No pueden tener sangre de Sam.- No puedo hacer mucho al respecto.

translation.en: Deena, you have to get clean too! Not a single drop, OK?
translation.es: Deena, ¡debes limpiarte!Que no quede ni una gota.

translation.en: I don't want to go in by myself.
[whispering] Up, up, down, down. Left, right, left, right, B, A, start.
translation.es: Arriba, arriba, abajo, abajo, izquierda,derecha, izquierda, derecha, B, A, start.

translation.en: OK, well, fine or not, we s… still need to cover it.
translation.es: Pues… aunque esté bien, debemos cubrirlo.

translation.en: [Kate] Do you really think this is going to work?
And, like, tonight's been the first time
translation.es: Y hoy ha sido la primera vez

translation.en: I've felt like myself in… months.
translation.es: que me he sentido yo misma en… meses.

translation.en: I forgot what that… what that felt like.
-♪ Wouldn't turn around and break it… ♪ -[Kate] Make sure my back is clean.
translation.es: Fíjate que tenga la espalda limpia.

translation.en: -You're gonna have to look at me. -♪ And anyone who's ever played a part ♪
What if tonight's it for us?
Did you… all go to pound town?
[Josh] The killers go to the blood.
Smile, you son of a bitch!
Are you sure you want to do this?
See you on the other side.
[Ruby Lane singing] ♪ You always hurt the one you love ♪
translation.es: Siempre hieres a quien más quieres.

translation.en: ♪ The one you shouldn't hurt at all ♪
Dude! She's here! I saw her!
She was… She was so sexy, but fucking crazy still!
She was doing it! Following the blood trails!
It's working. Skull Mask freak, three o'clock.
translation.es: Funciona. Máscara de Calavera a las tres.

translation.en: If this doesn't work, I will murder you!
No, no! We are not fucked!
She's fucked. They're coming for her.
translation.es: Ella está frita. Vienen por ella.

translation.en: If we put Sam in the hall, we end this now.
translation.es: Si ponemos a Samen el corredor, se termina.

translation.en: A bullet won't stop them, fine.
But we just tried to goddamn explode them, and that didn't work!
I mean, that's not exactly what she's saying.
translation.es: No es exactamente lo que dice.

translation.en: You'd let us all die to protect her. Look at this.
translation.es: Nos matarán a todospor protegerla. Mira esto.

translation.en: I don't want you guys to die for me.
translation.es: No quiero que mueran por mí.

translation.en: Let me go! Let me… Sam!
[Deena] Let me go. Let me go!

translation.es: C. BERMAN VIO A LA BRUJA

translation.en: -[Sam] What… what… what is going on? -[Kate] You're not doing this alone.
[Sam] Camp Nightwing. Summer of '78. Group of campers, brutal massacre.
translation.es: Campamento Nightwing. Verano del 78.Grupo de campistas. Masacre brutal.

translation.en: There was one Shadyside survivor, C. Berman.
"The still traumatized girl claims that amidst the carnage she saw the witch."
translation.es: "La niña traumatizada aseguraque vio a la bruja durante la matanza".

translation.en: Yeah, just like you. So, if she survived, I'm pretty sure--
translation.es: Como tú. Así que, si ella sobrevivió,estoy seguro de que…

translation.en: There may be a way for me to live too.
[Kate] I got it! C. Berman! 9006 Brennan Way.
-I'm not home right now. -I need some help here!
translation.es: - No estoy en casa.- ¡Necesito ayuda aquí!

translation.en: -Please leave a message after the beep. -No one's there!
Hello, my name is Deena Johnson. I think you saw the witch.
translation.es: Soy Deena Johnson.Creo que usted vio a la bruja.

translation.en: This shit is not gonna hold!
We need to know how you survived!
Hey! We're being attacked, alright? There are killers here!
If you're there, please pick up! Please answer!
-To record a new message, press one. -Fuck! No!
translation.es: - Para grabar un mensaje, presione uno.- ¡Maldición! ¡No!

translation.en: What? No, she's alive. That's the whole point.
translation.es: ¿Qué? Está viva. Ese es el punto.

translation.en: Yeah, she… she survived, but… but first she died.
[Deena] "C. Berman was found in the woods."
"Her heart had stopped but local boy performed CPR."
translation.es: Su corazón se detuvo,y un lugareño le hizo RCP".

translation.en: What if that's how she survived? Her heart stopped.
translation.es: ¿Y si así sobrevivió?Su corazón se detuvo.

translation.en: What is it? The fucking rhyme. The fucking rhyme!
translation.es: ¿Cómo es la maldita rima?¡La maldita rima!

translation.en: "She'll take your blood, she'll take your head!"
-[pounding continues] -It's just like Kate said. OK?
And then, just like this C. Berman bitch, we bring you back to life.
translation.es: Y luego, como hizo C. Berman, te resucitamos.

translation.en: Fuck it. I'm dying tonight one way or another.
translation.es: Al diablo. Moriré de una forma u otra.

translation.en: Let's try to bring me back.
A few months ago, my brother Timothy had an unfortunate experience
translation.es: Hace unos meses, mi hermano Timothytuvo una experiencia desafortunada

translation.en: in which he ingested too much of a certain substance.
translation.es: en la que ingirió demasiadode una cierta sustancia.

translation.en: He was dead for two minutes.
You need to take these in order. Pile one takes the edge off.
translation.es: Debes tomarlas en orden.El primer montón atenúa el efecto.

translation.en: You're gonna feel like you're being fucked by a unicorn.
translation.es: Sentirás que te coge un unicornio.

translation.en: Pile two is gonna bring your core temp way down.
translation.es: El segundo montón te bajará muchola temperatura corporal.

translation.en: You need to take a five-minute interval between pile two and pile three.
translation.es: Debes esperar cinco minutosentre el dos y el tres.

translation.en: That's really important, OK? Pile three brings you down and out,
translation.es: Es muy importante.El tercer montón te derriba.

translation.en: so take that "take five" or it's all gonna go to shit!
translation.es: ¡Haz la pausa o todo se irá al carajo!

translation.en: -How many do we have? -Tons. Like a thousand.
This is what brings her back. This is Jesus!

translation.es: La sangre de Sam marca el lugar.

translation.en: Remember half an hour ago, when you wanted to murder me?
You don't have to do this. You can leave.
translation.es: No tienen que hacerlo. Pueden marcharse.

translation.en: Remember when you decided to sacrifice yourself for us?
OK, I got stock room. You take the emergency exit.
translation.es: Iré al depósito.Tú ve a la salida de emergencia.

translation.en: Whoa! No, no, no! Splitting up is not a good idea at all.
But, dude, listen to me. I know that this is all fucked,
translation.es: Amigo, escúchame. Sé que esto está jodido,pero… debemos hacerlo.
Sé que esto está jodido,pero… debemos hacerlo.

translation.en: She doesn't have time for most people.
translation.es: No pasa el tiempo con cualquiera.

translation.en: She's being nice because we're probably gonna die.
translation.es: Está siendo amable porque quizás muramos.

translation.en: We would not be this far if it weren't for you.
translation.es: No hubiésemos llegado tan lejos sin ti.

translation.en: Now we have to keep those psychos away from Sam.
translation.es: Ahora debemos alejara esos psicópatas de Sam.

translation.en: What if we fuck up and just kill me?
What if you can't bring me back? [sniffles]
My whole future, my whole life in Shadyside.
translation.es: Todo mi futuro, toda mi vida en Shadyside.

translation.en: A night shift, a day shift,
and a million empty beer cans,
translation.es: millones de latas de cerveza vacías,

translation.en: But tonight, even though we are in hell,
translation.es: Pero hoy, aunque estemos en el infierno,

translation.en: I feel like I have another chance with you.
translation.es: siento que tengo otra oportunidad contigo.

translation.en: And I'm not gonna lose you again.
When this is all over, I am gonna take you on a date.
translation.es: Cuando todo acabe, te invitaré a salir.

translation.en: We're going to eat cheeseburgers and listen to the Pixies,
translation.es: Comeremos hamburguesasy escucharemos a The Pixies,

translation.en: and make out and have the best night of our goddamn lives.
translation.es: nos besaremos y tendremosla mejor noche de nuestras malditas vidas.

translation.en: But right now, you've got to die.
Now, look at me. Look at me.
I am going to bring you back.
-It's OK. It's OK. -[crying] I'm so sorry.
[Sam] I need to die. I need to die.
Josh, Josh! Come help me! Get the pens!
Help me! Go get the EpiPens!
I don't know. I don't know.
It has to work! It has to.
I will not let you do this.
[grunting] Come on, Sam. Come on. Come on, Sam!
We were picking up Sam's prescription.
translation.es: Fuimos a retirar la receta de Sam.

translation.en: And the lights went out. It was pitch black.
translation.es: Y se apagaron las luces.Estaba todo oscuro.

translation.en: We hid until it was over.
[Nick] You had 15 stitches in your shoulder.
translation.es: Te dieron 15 puntos en el hombro.

translation.en: Sam, you look like a ghost. Like you just came back from the dead.
translation.es: Sam, pareces un fantasma,como si hubieras vuelto de la muerte.

translation.en: I'll tell you what the facts tell me.
translation.es: Te diré lo que me dicen los hechos.

translation.en: They're to blame for everything. That feels too easy to me.
translation.es: Son los responsables de todo.Suena demasiado fácil para mí.

translation.en: But that's the story this department will go with
translation.es: Pero es la historia que creerán aquí,

translation.en: unless you can help me to see it differently.
translation.es: a menos que me ayudesa verla de otra forma.

translation.en: An underprivileged overachiever with bright prospects.
translation.es: Una chica aplicada sin oportunidadescon futuro prometedor.

translation.en: A guy who's been supporting his family alone since he was 15.
translation.es: Un chico que mantiene a su familiadesde los 15 años.

translation.en: Both succumbing to the quick cash of drugs.
translation.es: Ambos sucumbieronante el dinero fácil de las drogas".

translation.en: [Nick] You came here for my help. I should have listened to you. I'm sorry.
translation.es: Viniste por ayuda.Debí escucharte. Lo siento.

translation.en: But there's nothing else to say.
translation.es: Pero no hay nada más que decir.

translation.en: Do you want your friends going down for this?
So I'm a bad guy because I'm in here.
translation.es: Soy un villano por estar aquí.

translation.en: Then that makes you a bad guy, too, little man.
translation.es: Eso te convierte en lo mismo, amiguito.

translation.en: A drug-fueled night of violence leaves a trail of bodies.
translation.es: Noche de drogas incita a la violenciay se cobra vidas.

translation.en: [female reporter 2] There are three dead at East Union Medical…
translation.es: Tres muertos en el Hospital East Union…

translation.en: I wanted to give you this the other day.
translation.es: El otro día quería darte esto.

translation.en: But you don't have to open it right now.
translation.es: Pero no tienes que abrirlo ahora.

translation.en: Yeah, it's not a big deal. Just some pizza.
translation.es: No es gran cosa. Es pizza.

translation.en: Alright. Listen, asshole. Don't call here--
-[whispering voice echoes] Sam… -[woman] You called me.
Wanted to know how I survived the Camp Nightwing Massacre.
translation.es: Querías saber cómo sobrevivíen el campamento.

translation.en: [C. Berman] Did you touch the bones? Did you see her face?
Yeah, but, uh… thanks for your prompt reply.
translation.es: Sí, pero… gracias por su pronta respuesta.

translation.en: -[C. Berman] It's not over. -[whispering voice] Sam…
[C. Berman] But you haven't stopped her.
[C. Berman] She'll do whatever it takes.
♪ And gave it to the rich, yeah ♪
♪ And let the martyrs stretch, yeah ♪
translation.es: HAN PASADO MUCHAS COSAS… LO SÉ. ¿LO VIO? MATANZA A MANOS DE DROGADICTOSEN EL HOSPITAL, EL MERCADO…

translation.en: ♪ Singing one more time around Might do it ♪
translation.es: MATANZA A MANOS DE DROGADICTOSEN EL HOSPITAL, EL MERCADO… NO FUE SARAH FIER…
NO FUE SARAH FIER… FUERON ESOS ADICTOS, KATE Y SIMON.

translation.en: We have to get her back.
I'm going to get you back.
I thought there was a way to end it.
translation.es: Creí que había una manera de detenerla.

translation.en: ["School's Out" playing] ♪ School's out for summer… ♪
